bug.author: saif-ellafi
bug.summary: Verify all embeddings pathing is correct when redefining local dirs
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
setting configurations like --conf "spark.local.dir=/home/saif/tmp/" makes embeddings not work (embeddingsRef not found) properly in local environments. Internal config readings should be synchronized. <denchmark-h:h2>Expected Behavior</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Current Behavior</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h2>Possible Solution</denchmark-h>
